Completeness.description: Measures whether the solution addressed all aspects of the task.

Accuracy.description: Assesses the correctness of the information provided in the solution.

Efficiency.description: Evaluates the solution's ability to achieve the goal with minimal wasted effort or resources.

Adherence to Steps Required.description: Determines if the solution followed the necessary steps outlined for completing the task.

Reasoning Traceability.description: Assesses the transparency and traceability of the reasoning process in the solution.

Resource Utilization.description: Measures how well the solution uses available resources.

Communication Clarity.description: Evaluates how clearly the solution communicates the findings or results.

Time Effectiveness.description: Considers the amount of time taken to reach the solution relative to the task's complexity.

Innovation.description: Rates the novelty of the approach or methods used in solving the task.

Data Contamination Avoidance.description: Evaluates the solution's success in avoiding the use of contaminated or misleading data.
